"This will reset the database that holds all of the players that you have marked as your friend, for you to receive notifications about their online status, and those you marked as yourself.
Are you sure you want to continue? "
Reset the local database that holds player data.

This page displays all of the players you have marked as a friend, marked to receive notifications or marked as yourself. You can alter their marks here. Note: removing all marks will cause the player to be removed from this list and you will have to wait for them to come online again to add them again.
Flag if you want to receive notifications about this player.
Revora server is the source of the player data this app uses.
This icon represents yourself. You can configure the app to only send notifications if you are also online.
To access players that you have saved while they are offline, you can visit Settings > Manage Players.
This icon means that, if enabled, the app will notify you if this player is online.
This icon indicates friends. This is useful for recognizing players as you scroll through the list of players.
Clicking on a player will bring up a dialog. Clicking on any of checkboxes will save the player locally to the phone.
